page.title: 02DINEDOR CAMP 2
page.content: It is a very good quiet place to get out of town. It has{beautiful views over-looking the country-side. It has a{good picnic area}and big beech trees. It is an{ancient hill-fort, and is very steep but very pleasant. It is a good place to have{walks}and for{children to play,}as there is {plenty of space.} It is{usually quite {windy,}but if you are under the trees you do not notice much. There are some{houses}at the bottom of the hill, and a{youth camp}run by the {County Council}at the North end, but this is used only at week-ends and sometimes during the{school holidays.
